website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight, durable and budget-friendly bottle opener intended for home and restaurant use.
pros: Crafted from high-end stainless steel that ensures the bottle opener is constructed to last
Bottle opener measures 7" long x 1.5" wide
cons: Bottle opener may be too thin and has rough edges

customer_reviews.title: Two Fantastic Openers!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get these for a while. The price is right. But the reviews are spooky. If what you're looking for is a set of church keys; BLAMMO you're in luck! I don't know what any of the low reviews are on about. I got two. They open bottles. And I am able to spin them on my finger with the other end. The ones I received had no words on them. The metal wasn't really scuffed or anything.. I honestly have nothing negative to say. Five bucks got me two fantastic churchkeys. :) They open bottles, they're low cost and I'm sure they'll last me a long whiles!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for a party. When it arrived I only received one opener. When I called Amazon their customer service representative swore that it only came with one item. When I argued they said they would resend the product. After the phone call I checked the product reviews to see if people had similar issues. Lots of people had this issue. When the replacement came in it came with two openers and only one was punched properly. The second opener was useless. In the end I ended up with two working opener but not without putting up a fight for it. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: These bottle openers look okay, are easy to use, and are inexpensive. I like them, and so does my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple idiot proof bottle opener that was inexpensive. I only thought I needed one, but I am happy that it comes with two. I put one in a drawer inside my house, and put one on a lanyard on my dogs harness for parties. he loves being the walking bottle opener. The opener tucks in to a pocket on his vest. These bottle openers look okay, are easy to use, and are inexpensive. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The best bottle opener ever!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy to use. It has plenty of leverage so the caps pop off easily. It's made of sturdy stainless steel and does not bend or warp with normal use - you would have to put it in a vice and really torque on it to bend it. This one was a replacement because my previous one "walked off" after a big party. After years of use, no parts wore out like a standard bottle opener with the double tab.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Ebeling

customer_reviews.title: Cheap crap.
customer_reviews.text: For what we paid, these are pretty cheap... Not even what was pictured. There is no stamp on these saying that it is stainless steel like the other reviews said. The metal cut outs are not fully cut out and the edges are rough.
customer_reviews.author: Damion Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive.  Quality SS from India.
customer_reviews.text: These are great inexpensive bottle openers. They are a little big. Not recommended for use on a keychain. I have one hanging on a hook on my outside grill. Thin but sturdy stainless. They are made in India (it's not China) and appear to be of decent stainless quality. I mostly drink IPA and homebrew stuff so needing one of these around the grill is going to be great for the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: NEBAH617

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description may lead to long term disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: The product feels solid and I imagine I'll get years of use out of it until I eventually had it down to one of my future twin grandchildren. Unfortunately, her twin will never know the joy she felt when she graduated bar tending school and received her late grandfathers prized bottle opener. For the pure fact that the product only came with one bar key. Product description reads set of 2, and only one bar key arrived. For the price, it's still a great deal, but the product description is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Its a solid bar key. The only reason I ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a solid bar key. The only reason I gave it 3 stars is that I am used to opening bottles using the flat opener closest to the middle rather than the one closest to the end. This bar key only has the end thin enough to get bottles. The other end is a bit too thick to really get bottles. Nothing a little metal sanding cant fix. Just expected to be able to open from both sides of the opener flats
customer_reviews.author: ManOfIron

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Minimalist
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a newly finished bar....Partner question the need for such an item when he has his keychain. Not only do they add a serious look to any bar, but theyre also much easier to use than the small ones. Not sure why you'd ever need two, but I am sure that theyre thinking of something I havent yet (it is alcohol anyway). They add a feeling of class when you open your local microbrew (or your Bud....).
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: good leverage, heavy duty, effective opener!
customer_reviews.text: well made, good quality control, comfortable, effective opener... needed good leverage for weak hands due to illness and using regularly as intended. product is just as described and expected, received on time as expected... very pleased... thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & dekeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Realizing I was without one of the most basic items for a kitchen, I picked these up. The price was right, and I figured two was a great idea, in case one was ever lost or misplaced. These are quite large but durable, definitely allow you to open bottles with ease. As someone else mentioned the edges are a bit sharp, but I handle with caution. I also love that they are simple in look, and stainless steel matches nearly everything else in my kitchen. I'm definitely glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle opener! The only thing that might improve it would be to add a magnet to the back. I glued one on, so I can hang it on the side of the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Alfawolf1

customer_reviews.title: They serve their purpose
customer_reviews.text: Craftsmanship isn't great. The steel isn't flat, it has ripples in it and the edges are quite sharp. Expect to take a file or sand paper to them. The bottom line is that they're cheap and good enough to throw into the picnic utensil box, which is all I wanted them for.
customer_reviews.author: KBeagle

customer_reviews.title: Dual purpose design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design with the circle on the opposite end of the bottle opener. The circle provides leverage to quickly pull the caps off of liquor bottles with cork tops e.g. single malt scotch and many premium vodka's without having to peel off the foil. I think some people use that hole for attaching a carabiner or string to hang the bottle opener from a ice chest or other storage. Works on many levels.
customer_reviews.author: Lynanagniappe

customer_reviews.title: Bartender quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a reliable bottle opener. Durable and bartender quality (I've seen multiple bartenders use a product with this same design use these behind the bar).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered "set of 2". Only got one (after waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered "set of 2". Only got one (after waiting many weeks). FALSE ADVERTISING!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Essential for the bar
customer_reviews.text: These bottle openers are extremely sturdy full sized bar tools. The long handle provides for great leverage and a secure "feel" in your palm. If your looking for openers that will last forever (or at least until you lose them) these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Professional bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Got to have one of these if you own a cooler. Easy to use and large enough that you don't misplace it.
customer_reviews.author: LakeLady

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: For the money it's a pretty decent piece but I brought this on my kayak once. Don't think it was even exposed to saltwater except maybe a little on my hands and it already started to rust that evening.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H.

customer_reviews.title: its a perfect buy and will last you a long time
customer_reviews.text: thickness is just right. unless your actually bending this really hard to test it you wont bend or ruin it. if your using this for what its supposed to be used for which is opening bottles, its a perfect buy and will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Ask For More!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you want it to do, namely opening a bottle, and it won't break. A bargain for the money, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Z. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle openners
customer_reviews.text: Can't complain here. This product does what it is supposed too and it was the cheapest bottle openers I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, metal is unfinished looks kind of raw. Also overall size is larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: followyoursole

customer_reviews.title: The openers work really well but the company claims they ...
customer_reviews.text: The openers work really well but the company claims they are stainless and the 2 I bought are starting to rust already.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Just as described good heavy duty bottle opener no BS opens the bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described good heavy duty bottle opener no BS opens the bottle perfectly not all messed up how some bottle openers may
customer_reviews.author: Alex Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite type of bottle opener from my days working in ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite type of bottle opener from my days working in restaurants. Glad I bought one for at-home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle openers
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle openers. Perfect for customization. Definitely great to have around for get togethers when people are bringing their own bottles. Never fun to go digging through the utensil drawer looking for that wine opener with the bottle opener on it. These save the day!
customer_reviews.author: Tryp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No surprises, product is solid as a rock. No frills, but no rip off price, either.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice
customer_reviews.text: It was too big for my liking and very uncomfortable in the hand. I would have like it to have been not as wide. I also only recieved one when it says it comes in a set of two so i dont know what that was about. It did come before it said it was going to which would have been nice if the delivery date wasnt a month after i bought it. Im not satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Harty

customer_reviews.title: Hand Made
customer_reviews.text: They work but I made these by hand in 7th grade machine/metal shop. About the same look.
customer_reviews.author: C. W. Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Despite that it's a good bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap and they work well. One thing I will say...I bought them mainly because they were flat and I wanted to attach one to a magnetic strip we have in the kitchen but they don't stick to a magnet at all. Despite that it's a good bottle opener, just stuck it in a kitchen drawer instead.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great set of classic
customer_reviews.text: Great set of classic, flat bottle openers that are precision cut...almost with too much precision. The loop at the opposite end of the opener is super sharp at the edges, so be careful. These have much more leverage than those keychain openers, great for fast opening.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just work
customer_reviews.text: I have been using small, key-chain type bottle openers for a while. I got tired of digging through the drawer to find them, then having to use my hand as leverage with the small opener. These bottle openers are large and sturdy. Just like bartenders use. They just work. They're fast, easy, with no fuss. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M

customer_reviews.title: Not made for a professional bartender.
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick but it is not that great at popping bottles quickly. The metal bends so it doesn't give me that strong and speedy open that I need. It'll bend the bottle cap but doesn't pop it open all the way. If you are not a bartender, this will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: KKEO

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Minimalist Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These are huge, easy to use, and I prefer the minimal design vs. all the other obnoxious bottle openers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you think it is. Simple piece of ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you think it is. Simple piece of steel (it's a 2-pack) that opens bottles. Solid enough to work well, but not heavy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It did what it's supposed to. No more no less.
customer_reviews.author: Mikael Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, sturdy enough not to bend or get scratched
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener!
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to hold and removes bottle caps easily. Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great opener- solid and works well for us on large or small beer bottles.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend.  Great Purchase.  Heavy Duty.
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and super cheap. I have one on my keychain to not only never lose my keys but to always have a bottle opener when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, heavy duty stainless steel. Love the 2 pack: one for the kitchen and one for the backyard. Reminiscent of the traditional "church key"
customer_reviews.author: Broker71

customer_reviews.title: As exected, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am not dissapointed in the product. they are bar keys. Standard issue style. I was happy they got to me on time and meet the quality that I expected. It's hard to rate anything higher than 3 stars for a standard bar key. Great service though. Fast and efficient shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Kat

customer_reviews.title: There's nothing worse than not being able to find a bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Yay, you get two and they're exactly what I was expecting. There's nothing worse than not being able to find a bottle opener, when you're really wanting an ice cold beer.
customer_reviews.author: Skippy

customer_reviews.title: Ships With Only 1 in Package
customer_reviews.text: The title mentions this is a pack of 2, but shipped with only one in the package. Solid construction, and does what it needs to do, but you will receive only 1, not the noted 2.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Meissner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Plain and simple and they work
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty, well made.  Same one as bartenders use.
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect. The same one as the bartenders use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no nonsense bottle opener great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for inexpensive sturdy bottle openers since we tailgate and go to partys alot and kept losing openers. These were at a great price, they looked like a professional bartender type opener, good size not to small not too big and had a nice finish. Worth price!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: all said it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Machining and finish are ok, all said it works great!
customer_reviews.author: D&S

customer_reviews.title: HUGE
customer_reviews.text: They work really well but they are HUGE. I wanted heavy duty but these things are longer than my hand. I can't return them so I am glad they were cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Louise Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Smooth edge and sturdy. Right size for easy handling. I hot-glue a magnet to it, the most beautiful thing on my fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible, easy to use, and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I have a handful of these bottle openers. Some are lashed to various posts where i work, others I keep in my pocket. I've never seen one break or bend. They're professional and work great at exactly one task: opening bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: these bar openers are the best kind. they are wide and fit well in ...
customer_reviews.text: these bar openers are the best kind. they are wide and fit well in the palm, and long enough for easy leverage. every bartender should have one for their back pocket. two pack is nice for losing one at the bar or to a coworker.
customer_reviews.author: ellay

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done! Stash one in every cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! Stash one in every cooler compartment you can.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It is a heavy gauge metal but since there is no rubber or plastic grip, it is nice and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. This has great heft to it, it's heavier than most others but also doesn't have a flimsy feel to it. Takes a bit of getting used to, but once you get the center right, you'll be loading up buckets of beer bottles in no-time flat.
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: does what it needs too just wish it didnt come ...
customer_reviews.text: does what it needs too they are bigger than i imangined but i think that is a good thing they are nice and sturdy and will be used by me for a long time to come just wish it didnt come with a sticker on it i had to work to get it off
customer_reviews.author: Omar marquez

customer_reviews.title: nice opener but ...
customer_reviews.text: The openers were taped together when I received them and the tape was very hard to get off and left a lot of residue. I put the openers in the dishwasher hoping to remove and or soften the residue and was unexpectedly surprised to find a lot of rust spots on the openers.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Vance

customer_reviews.title: This is one HUGE Bottle Opener, but works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is one huge bottle opener. We didn't anticipate the size of these until we got them! LOL They work great, but man they are big
customer_reviews.author: Autobadges

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: These things are comically large. About the size of a child's forearm
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I also liked having more than one. It is almost too flat because sometimes it is hard to pick up, but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkamusic06

customer_reviews.title: they're the same size as any I've seen behind the bar and sturdy enough to outlast a career in the service industry
customer_reviews.text: Solid speed keys. I'm not sure why other reviews were so critical of the dimensions of the openers: they're the same size as any I've seen behind the bar and sturdy enough to outlast a career in the service industry. If you can manage not to lose them before then.
customer_reviews.author: alex herbert

customer_reviews.title: Works food
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Saves your fingers when opening those twist off beer bottle tops.
customer_reviews.author: Albert L. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Strong and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Strong. Totally flat. Easy to use. About 5 inches long X 1.5 inches wide. Good thick metal. Have never bent even a little, good and sturdy. I can see how these would be useful in an actual bar. I use mine at home.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestLadyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Simple, smartly done
customer_reviews.text: Simple and almost elegant, very sturdy/heavy duty. Shiny polished stainless steel. The outside edges are a bit sharp on the hands, but just a touch of 200 grit knocked that right down.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew T. Oakey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality stainless steel and professional quality. I highly recommend getting a few of these.

customer_reviews.title: works great. Check the dimensions this is much bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. Check the dimensions this is much bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.author: alan

customer_reviews.title: Strong and cheap and well-made
customer_reviews.text: You get two strong, bottle openers for almost nothing-what a great deal. They will last longer than you, and don't take up any space.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: It opens beer well. It fits in a pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: It opens beer well. It fits in a pocket well.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Streamlined, modern looking, doesn't take up much space and is a pack of 2!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love how easy it is to use
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use, slightly frustrated with the slight burr along the circle. Had to use a small file to round it off, to not cut myself. I suppose if I got a spin ring for it, I would of never cared.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lemanski

customer_reviews.title: Great opener, thanks
customer_reviews.text: Has never slipped off a cap while opening. Great opener, thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Convienent
customer_reviews.text: A cheap piece of steel. I love it bc it's so convenient

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bottle openers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Granddaughter stainless steel is hard to beat and she loves them! Buy yourself or someone a couple of these today you can't beat the price or quality of them.

customer_reviews.title: ... openers are larger than I expected but they work wonderfully. Heavy duty and stainless steel--they're made to last ...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: We bought two because we loved them so much

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect. These openers are big so if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought strong round magnets and glued them on the back so I could put it on my fridge. Works perfect. These openers are big so if you have small hands you might struggle. Perfect size for a manly bottle opener.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Plus not as heavy as some are
customer_reviews.text: The spinner rings are a must for this. Great tool. Plus not as heavy as some are. Very quick and easy.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bottle Openers
customer_reviews.text: I have one my kitchen drawer and one tied to my cooler for tailgates. This is the best bottle opener I've ever owned. The size (specifically the length) requires little effort to pop off a cap, leverage. I highly recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!

customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these I didn't realize it came with 2! I was pleasantly surprised when they arrived even earlier than expected. I would definitely recommend buying this product- great value :)

customer_reviews.title: We like that it has the hole at the end so ...
